channel.title: [317] Sounds
channel.description: I've been working for past 3 hours on trying to get sounds working on a 317 client, its accepting the packet I send from the server, and that's it, it receives it, and nothing else happens.. I'm not sure what code to post up for you guys to help, just let me know.

item.title: [317] Sounds
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:3, topic:453470”]Yes, because the client does not have any sound or music system.
Try this. The sounds and songs are loaded in the signlink class. I think you can figure it out yourself.[/quote]
I took all the client class code from a deob, didn’t look in the signlink class… I have to go add all of that back again x.x
I always have an issue when I change the following packet however… I’ll figure it out, but thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Sounds
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Yes, because the client does not have any sound or music system.
Try this. The sounds and songs are loaded in the signlink class. I think you can figure it out yourself.
